GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.15.34
GSD.description:
drbd: Fix five use after free bugs in get_initial_state

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit a972c768723359ec995579902473028fe3cd64b1, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit a29728463b254ce81ecefdf20c1a02e01d9361da. For more details please see the references link.
